Articles.Content:
I have created a spreadsheet that I used to temporarily replace Kerbal Engineer Redux on my Realism Overhaul KSP instance. I don't need it anymore, so I thought I would share it with you guys and see what you think. Scott Manley's

videos were extremely helpful in creating this.

I worked pretty hard on this project, and I learned a lot of geometry and mathematics (I'm only in Algebra I). The only thing I'm not sure about is the Inclination change calculation. Other than that, everything is working. You need Microsoft Excel to open it:

Rocketry Spreadsheet.xls

I would like feedback on what I should add, and also about the design and layout of the spreadsheet (is it visually appealing/easy to use?)

I look forward to hearing your thoughts!

Edited May 7, 2014 by jandcando
